question: What are the prices related to your cupholders?
answer: Regular cupholders (1 leather & 1 chain) cost ₱ 549.00 while bundled cupholders (1 leather & 2 chains) cost ₱695.00.

question: Can I have a customized name engraved on my order?
answer: Yes. Name customization includes an additional fee of ₱ 150.00, but comes as FREE for every purchase of bundles!

question: Do you accept cash-on-delivery (COD) as payment method?
answer: Yes. We accept cash-on-delivery nationwide, except for orders with customized name.

question: Are there any freebies included?
answer: Yes. We have the following freebies on all orders: 1 metal straw and 1 cleaning brush.

question: Can I create my own bundle?
answer: Yes. You can mix and match according to your aesthetics.

question: Do you ship in Visayas and Mindanao?
answer: Yes. We ship nationwide via GoGo Xpress.

question: How long does it take for the order to be shipped?
answer: We ship your orders right away once payment has been settled. Expect the following delivery duration: 1-3 days for NCR, 2-4 days for Luzon, 2-5 days for Visayas, and 3-6 days for Mindanao.

question: Do your gold or silver chains fade?
answer: Our chains are tarnish-free and does not fade. We provide high-quality aluminum metal for our holders.
